pullrequest.title: Polaris: raise steering wheel, add collision shapes for roll cage and handles

content.raw:
We're working on the steering texture. @nkoenig and I are discussing whether to use the mesh you've provided or to attach collada nodes from a larger mesh as visuals.

The handbrake that has the wood texture is the one that actually works, the other is just part of the visual mesh, and is more involved to remove.

Can you file issues for the button interface and key switch in the drcsim issue tracker?
content.html:
We're working on the steering texture. @nkoenig and I are discussing whether to use the mesh you've provided or to attach collada nodes from a larger mesh as visuals.

The handbrake that has the wood texture is the one that actually works, the other is just part of the visual mesh, and is more involved to remove.

Can you file issues for the button interface and key switch in the drcsim issue tracker?
